Note: Before running this test, delete all registered custom handlers and restart your browser.

  1. Put this file in the ./handlers/ directory of your Opera install and restart your browser.
  2. Load this page. There should be a dialog asking to handle the test protocol.
  3. Then load this page. There should not be any dialog.
  4. Click the Download settings menu item in your Opera build.
  5. Load this page. There should be a dialog asking to handle the sms protocol.
  6. Then load this page. There should be any dialog.
